work-item.field:
A test case specification shall aim to evaluate the operation of a key element or function of the
system. For each test case, identify or specify

Test items
Identify and briefly describe the items and features to be exercised by this test case.

Input specifications
Specify inputs required to execute the test case. The inputs might be specified by value (with tolerances where appropriate),
or by name. Specify also all required relationships between inputs (e.g., timing).

Output specifications
Specify outputs expected from executing the test case relevant to pass or fail criteria. (e.g., response time).

Environmental needs
  • characteristics and configurations of required hardware
  • required system and application software
  • other special equipment or specially-trained personnel
Special procedural requirements
Special constraints on test procedures that execute this test case

Inter-case dependencies
Test cases that must be executed before this test case should be linked using the "depends_on" link role.
